title: Tax Increases Aren’t the Answer to Budget Impasse, Harris Says (RoseMarie Swanger)
text: ( Source : RoseMarie Swanger ) HARRISBURG - Rep. Adam Harris (R-Franklin/Juniata/Mifflin) today voted against a measure considered and rejected by the state House that would have increased the state Personal Income Tax by 16 percent. The House
